title: Animation Gallery

title: Hello! I’m Nathan :)
text:
Right now, I work at the Alan Turing Institute in the Research Engineering Group. Here’s what I’m focusing on right now.
Want to know more? Check out my projects page, or browse the animation gallery, where I’ve collected some of my favourite visualisations from my time in research.
Thanks for stopping by! ✨

There’s plenty more on my GitHub, or you can visit the animation gallery. I’m always happy to chat more if you’re interested in me or my work (especially if you’re early in your career!). Just shoot me an email (phinate at pm dot me), or reach out on Twitter.
